item.title: Ananya Panday calls long-distance relationship ‘healthy’ amidst dating rumours with Walker Blanco - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ananya Panday Discusses Long-Distance Relationships Amidst Dating Rumors

Date: Dec 30, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Ananya Panday is currently rumored to be dating Walker Blanco, and she recently shared her thoughts on long-distance relationships during an interview, stating they can be 'healthy.'

  • Ananya attended Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant’s wedding with Walker Blanco.
  • In a new interview, she highlighted the benefits of having space in a relationship.
  • She reflected on her growth and comfort in her identity within relationships.
  • Her upcoming projects include a second season of 'Call Me Bae' and a romantic drama 'Chaand Mera Dil.'
“I actually think it is quite healthy sometimes to have some space. Two months is okay. Actually, distance does make the heart grow fonder.” - Ananya Panday

Ananya Panday's evolving perspective on relationships reflects her personal growth, suggesting that distance may indeed enhance connections.

item.title: Chinese Snake Horoscope 2025: A Year to Shine and Set Goals - The Times of India
item.description:
Chinese Snake Horoscope 2025: A Year to Shine and Set Goals

Publication Date: [Unknown] Source: [Unknown]

This article explores the astrological predictions for individuals born under the Snake sign in the year 2025, emphasizing new opportunities, personal goals, and overall growth.

  • 2025 is seen as a year of prosperity for those born under the Snake sign.
  • Encouragement to set and pursue personal goals.
  • Predictions align with trends in career advancement and personal relationships.
"The Snake will find guidance in the stars to attain their dreams this year."

In conclusion, 2025 is portrayed as a promising year for Snakes, encouraging them to seize opportunities for improvement and success.

item.title: Shalini Passi says she married at 20, had a son at 21 but had one important condition for husband: ‘He should not…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shalini Passi: Marrying Young and Having a Child at 21, with No Regrets

Date: 2024-12-01, Source: Indian Express

Shalini Passi, known for her appearances in 'Fabulous Lives vs Bollywood Wives,' has shared her perspective on getting married at 20 and becoming a mother at 21. In an interview with Mojo Story, she expressed no regrets about her decision, describing it as a 'great move by the universe.'

  1. Shalini had an arranged marriage with Sanjay Passi, the owner of the PASCO group, after his family spotted her at a wedding.
  2. She had a condition for her arranged marriage: her husband should not drink, smoke, or gamble.
  3. Despite initial challenges, Shalini mastered the art of hosting and adapted to her new lifestyle.
  4. She is known for her love for art and philanthropic work.
“It was a very good move by the universe because I had so much energy and enthusiasm back then. What happens with women is later in their life, the energy and recovery gets extremely different. When young, you recover early. I became a mom at 21. Because I was young, I used to get more excited than my son when I took him to a toy store. Its like I am almost living my life in reverse.”

Shalini Passi reflects on her young marriage and motherhood, emphasizing her enthusiasm and energy during that period.

item.title: Shweta Tiwari Reacts To Palak Tiwari And Ibrahim Ali Khan Dating Rumours: 'They Will Forget...' - News18
item.description:
Shweta Tiwari Unfazed by Palak Tiwari and Ibrahim Ali Khan's Dating Rumors

Date & Source: Last Updated: December 30, 2024, 17:51 IST

Actress Shweta Tiwari has reacted to the persistent dating rumors surrounding her daughter, Palak Tiwari, and actor Ibrahim Ali Khan. While the two have repeatedly dismissed the rumors, Shweta has now revealed that she no longer lets such speculations bother her.

In a recent interview, Shweta expressed her indifference towards the rumors, stating that people's memory spans are short and that negativity sells in the media. She also mentioned that she has dealt with similar situations in the past and has learned to not let them affect her.

Palak and Ibrahim's dating rumors first surfaced in 2022 when they were photographed together. However, they have maintained that they are just friends. Palak, in an interview with Siddharth Kannan, clarified that they were with a group of people when they were snapped together and that there was no romantic involvement between them.

On the work front, Palak was last seen in Salman Khan's Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan.

item.title: Only 1 Indian actor made it to The Independent's list of Best Actors of 21st century. It's not Shah Rukh Khan, Amitabh - Hindustan Times
item.description:
The Independent listed 60 best actors of the 21st century. Not Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan or Amitabh Bachchan, but this Indian actor made the cut.

Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: The Independent

The Independent has curated a list of the 60 best actors of the 21st century. Notably, the list includes international talents while specifically excluding performances from films released after 2000.

  • Irrfan Khan is the only Indian actor to be featured on the list, ranked at #41.
  • Other prominent Indian actors such as Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, and Amitabh Bachchan are absent from this list.
  • The late actor celebrated for his roles in films such as The Warrior, Haasil, and Life of Pi.
  • Philip Seymour Hoffman was recognized as the best actor, with female representation by Emma Stone, ranked at #2.
“It’s Irrfan Khan’s eyes, hooded and deep brown, that will live eternally. They granted him the ability to weave magic, to recite poetry without moving his lips.”

The recognition of Irrfan Khan amidst international talents highlights his impactful performances and legacy in cinema.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Sanjay Leela Bhansali signs KD director Prem for Rowdy Rathore 2; Scripting in progress - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Sanjay Leela Bhansali Signs Director Prem for Rowdy Rathore 2; Scripting in Progress

Date & Source: Dec 30, 2024 | 02:59 PM IST | Pinkvilla

Over the years, there has been constant chatter on the sequel to Akshay Kumar’s 2012 blockbuster, Rowdy Rathore, which was produced by Sanjay Leela Bhansali and directed by Prabhudeva. Several names have been floating around in the media to carry forward this cop-based action entertainer. Now, we have exclusively learned that Sanjay Leela Bhansali has signed Kannada film director Prem and has entrusted him with the responsibility of developing the script for Rowdy Rathore 2.

According to sources close to the development, Sanjay Leela Bhansali is very excited to bankroll the sequel to Rowdy Rathore and had locked the core plot of the film a while back. The basic idea of Rowdy Rathore 2 has been in place for the longest time, and SLB was looking to partner with the right forces to develop a banger of a sequel to this 2012 blockbuster. His thoughts have aligned with Prem, and the duo is working towards developing the script of Rowdy Rathore 2.

The source further added that the Rowdy Rathore sequel will move into the casting stage once the screenplay is locked. Prem will full-fledgedly move into the pre-production of Rowdy Rathore 2 after the release of KD – The Devil. The film is expected to take off sometime by the end of 2025, and the casting will begin from Summer next year. Right now, the energies are being invested to develop a script that does justice to the legacy of the first part.

Will Akshay Kumar return to Rowdy Rathore 2? "We shall know that at the right time. It could be Akshay Kumar, a new hero, or who knows, a two-hero film too," the source concluded.

item.title: Srikanth Odela about his film with Chiru – You won’t see vintage Megastar - 123telugu
item.description:
Srikanth Odela about his film with Chiru – You won’t see vintage Megastar

Published on Dec 30, 2024 2:33 pm IST

Megastar Chiranjeevi's collaboration with Dasara director Srikanth Odela is finally happening, much to the delight of fans. This long-awaited project promises to set a fresh tone for the iconic star.

  • Chiranjeevi teams up with new-age filmmaker Srikanth Odela.
  • The film will be set against a period backdrop.
  • Odela expresses his disbelief at working with Chiranjeevi, citing a lifelong admiration.
  • He emphasizes that viewers will not see the traditional vintage Megastar.
  • The script was finalized in just 48 hours with Chiranjeevi's enthusiasm inspiring Odela.
  • Odela's upcoming film follows 'The Paradise' with actor Nani.
“You won’t see the vintage Megastar. Instead, you will see him in an age-appropriate and fresh role.” - Srikanth Odela

This project marks an exciting new chapter for both Srikanth Odela and Chiranjeevi, as it aims to present the Megastar in a modern light.

item.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Abhir Regains consciousness; accuses Vidya for Hit-and-Run case - India Forums
item.description:
Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Abhir Accuses Vidya After Regaining Consciousness

Published: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 8:28 AM

In the upcoming episode of the show, Abhir wakes up post-accident and identifies Vidya as the person involved, shocking both Armaan and Abhira.

  • After an accident involving Abhir and Vidya, Vidya unintentionally hits Abhir with her car due to brake failure.
  • Vidya panics and leaves the scene, leading to Abhir being rushed to the hospital.
  • Upon regaining consciousness, Abhir accuses Vidya, causing immediate distress for his family.
  • Abhira stands up for Abhir, believing he will be vindicated.
  • The episode highlights relationship dynamics, with Armaan seeking reconciliation with Abhira while facing challenges from Kaveri.
“Abhira stands firm in defending Abhir's innocence.”

This episode promises dramatic developments surrounding Abhir's accusation and its effect on relationships.

item.title: Latest : Pawan Kalyan comments on Allu Arjun - 123telugu
item.description:
Pawan Kalyan Comments on Allu Arjun Incident

Published on Dec 30, 2024 | Source: 123telugu

Pushpa 2's premiere tragedy and Allu Arjun's arrest sparked debates. Pawan Kalyan, for the first time, shares his perspective.

  1. Pawan Kalyan appreciates Telangana CM Revanth Reddy's support to the film industry.
  2. He expresses sadness over Revathi's death and criticizes the lack of empathy shown.
  3. Kalyan believes Allu Arjun shouldn't be solely blamed for the incident.

"A minor issue was unnecessarily turned into a major controversy... The law is equal for everyone." - Pawan Kalyan

Pawan Kalyan suggests better communication and empathy to handle such situations.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun film nears 1300cr in India after fourth weekend - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun film nears 1300cr in India after fourth weekend

Published on Dec 30, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

By the end of its fourth weekend, Pushpa 2 is expected to gross around Rs. 1330 crore, inching closer to the record.

  • Pushpa 2 grossed Rs. 39.50 crore approx at the Indian box office in its fourth weekend.
  • Total gross as of now stands at Rs. 1294 crore approx.
  • The film's record-setting ETA is projected for the fifth weekend.
  • The territorial breakdown shows significant earnings across various regions, with a total of Rs. 1293.50 crore in India.
“The fourth week has the one big holiday for New Year's Day, which could lead to increased collections.”

The success of Pushpa 2 continues to build momentum, setting it up for a record-breaking performance soon.

item.title: Rana Daggubati unveils ‘Bapu’ first look poster - 123telugu
item.description:
Rana Daggubati unveils ‘Bapu’ first look poster

Published on: Dec 30, 2024 1:15 pm IST

Rana Daggubati has released the first look for the upcoming film 'Bapu', a dark comedy-drama that promises to blend humor with emotional depth.

  • Produced by Comrade Film Factory, 'Bapu' is directed by Daya.
  • The film features Brahmaji and a stellar ensemble cast including Amani, Balagam Sudhakar Reddy, and Dhanya Balakrishna.
  • The plot centers on a farming family facing a profound emotional dilemma.
  • The film combines a dark premise with dark comedy.
“It tackles grave situations with humor to present an unconventional yet poignant narrative.”

The film aims to offer a unique experience by intertwining family dynamics with humor and emotion.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Savi slaps Rajat at the airport to stop him - India Forums
item.description:
Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Savi slaps Rajat at the airport to stop him

Published: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 7:24 AM

In the upcoming episode, Rajat plans to permanently relocate to Singapore, causing Savi to confront him in a moment of emotional turmoil.

  • Rajat, manipulated by Arsh, believes Savi is having an affair, leading to jealousy and accusations.
  • Rajat aims to distance himself from Savi to allow her to move forward in life.
  • During an emotional confrontation at the airport, Savi slaps Rajat to express her deep love and desire for him to stay.
  • Rajat, realizing Savi's feelings, ultimately decides not to go to Singapore.
“This action symbolizes her deep love for him. Savi desires Rajat to stay and transform for the better.”

The emotional confrontation between Savi and Rajat highlights the complexities of their relationship and the impact of misunderstandings fueled by external manipulation.

item.description:
Squid Game Season 2 ENDING Explained: Gi-Hun's Failed Rebellion, Front Man's Real Plan And More Cliffhanger Questions

Publication Date: December 26, 2023

Source: The News Network

Squid Game Season 2 has unleashed mayhem on Netflix with its gripping storyline. This season follows Seong Gi-hun, who returns to the deadly game amidst chaos and strategic conflicts.

  • Gi-hun plans a rebellion against the game but ends up without backup.
  • The stakes rise as players face dire consequences, with numerous casualties.
  • Hwang In-ho reveals his true identity as the Front Man and backstabs Gi-hun.
  • The season ends with unresolved cliffhangers, leaving viewers eager for the next installment.
“While we need to wait to get answers in its final season in 2025, here are some burning questions that have left us wondering.”

The unresolved nature of the ending and the revelations about the characters heighten the anticipation for future episodes.

item.title: Dil Raju meets Pawan Kalyan – Game Changer pre-release event venue finalised? - 123telugu
item.description:
Dil Raju Meets Pawan Kalyan: Venue Finalized for Game Changer Pre-Release Event?

Published on Dec 30, 2024 12:01 pm IST

Today, on a bustling Monday morning, Tollywood producer Dil Raju met with Andhra Pradesh Deputy CM Pawan Kalyan at his Mangalagiri camp office. This meeting aims to finalize the details for the pre-release event of Dil Raju's much-anticipated film Game Changer.

  • Pawan Kalyan will attend the pre-release event for Game Changer.
  • The event is tentatively scheduled for January 4 or 5, 2025, in Rajahmundry.
  • Fans are excited about the appearance of Pawan Kalyan and Ram Charan together.
  • The film features notable actors, including Kiara Advani and SJ Suryah, and is set for release on January 10, 2025.
“More details are expected soon.”

This meeting has raised anticipation among fans, who look forward to updates regarding the event.

item.description:
Bachchan Family Attends Viral Wedding in Mumbai

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

Abhishek Bachchan, along with Amitabh Bachchan and Jaya Bachchan, made headlines as they attended a wedding in Mumbai, sparking viral interest on social media.

  • The Bachchan family attended the wedding reception of Rikin Yadav and Surabhi.
  • Rikin Yadav is the son of a long-time associate of the Bachchan family.
  • Abhishek was seen wearing an ivory kurta pyjama while Amitabh donned a black kurta pyjama with a bandh gala.
  • Fans noticed the absence of Aishwarya Rai Bachchan at the event.
Amitabh Bachchan referred to the swirling rumors around his family as 'speculated untruths' in a cryptic blog post.

The appearance of the Bachchan family at the wedding reinforces positive public perception amid recent speculation regarding their personal lives.

item.title: Sharvari wraps up last working day of 2024 on Alpha set: “Going to work has been my biggest blessing” - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Sharvari Wraps Up Last Working Day of 2024 on Alpha Set: “Going to Work Has Been My Biggest Blessing”

12/12/2024, Source: Bollywood Hungama

Bollywood actress Sharvari wrapped up her final working day of 2024 on a high note, filming an action sequence for her upcoming movie Alpha. She shared a behind-the-scenes image on her Instagram Stories, expressing gratitude for each working day of the year.

Alpha, a groundbreaking film in the YRF spy-universe, is directed by Shiv Rawail and features Sharvari alongside Alia Bhatt and Anil Kapoor. The film promises to be a high-octane spy thriller and the first female-led film in the franchise.

Sharvari reflected on her intense journey in 2024, with her work on Alpha being a significant source of motivation and accomplishment as the year comes to a close.

item.title: Naga Chaitanya in talks for yet another supernatural thriller? - 123telugu
item.description:
Naga Chaitanya in Talks for Another Supernatural Thriller

Published on Dec 30, 2024

Actor Naga Chaitanya is considering another supernatural thriller after the success of Amazon Prime's 'Dhootha'. This project would be under the direction of Karthik Varma Dandu and produced by Arka Media Works, known for 'Baahubali'. Chaitanya is yet to sign the project, which is expected to start filming in the second half of 2025.

  1. Chaitanya's interest in supernatural thrillers
  2. Upcoming project under Karthik Varma Dandu
  3. Potential production by Arka Media Works
  4. Expected filming timeline

Chaitanya will also star in 'Thandel', an emotional seaside love story alongside Sai Pallavi, set to release worldwide on February 7.

item.title: Laapataa Ladies actor Nitanshi Goel reveals Kriti Sanon's compliment for her: I see younger version of myself in you - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kriti Sanon Compliments Laapataa Ladies Actor Nitanshi Goel

Publication Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Nitanshi Goel, the star of Laapataa Ladies, expressed her joy over a heartfelt compliment from Kriti Sanon, who noted a resemblance to her younger self.

  • Nitanshi Goel received a compliment from Kriti Sanon, expressing that she sees her younger self in Goel.
  • The scene where Nitanshi's character, Phool, breaks down was improvised and moved the film's team to tears.
  • Laapataa Ladies is a feminist drama set in early 2000s rural India, focusing on swapped brides.
  • The film was India's official entry for the Oscars but did not make it to the final shortlist.
Kriti Sanon: "I see little Kriti in you. I wish to see you kill it on screen." - Nitanshi Goel reminiscing about the compliment she received.

The encouraging words from Kriti Sanon stand as a significant milestone for Nitanshi Goel and highlight the supportive nature of female relationships in the film industry.

item.title: Sonakshi Sinha, Zaheer Iqbal get roaring alarm on their Australia holiday! Watch as a lion appears at their window - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sonakshi Sinha, Zaheer Iqbal get roaring alarm on their Australia holiday!

Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Newlyweds Sonakshi Sinha and Zaheer Iqbal are currently enjoying their vacation in Australia, staying in a glass house surrounded by lions in Canberra.

  • On Monday morning, the couple shared a video of a roaring lion outside their glass wall, captioned “Today's alarm clock!!!!”
  • They previously shared a video of a lion and lioness playing near their accommodation.
  • They have engaged in several activities including scuba diving, sunbathing, and bungee jumping during their trip.
  • Zaheer shared a funny video of a road trip where he startled Sonakshi awake while she was asleep.
Zaheer jokingly stated, “Jabse isse mili hu meri neend udd gayi hai” (My sleep has gone for a toss ever since I met her).

This adventurous holiday has showcased the couple's fun-filled experiences and interactions with wildlife in Australia.

item.title: Marco (Hindi) Box Office Collection: Unni Mukundan's Movie Sees Strong Growth Over Its First 10 Days - Filmibeat
item.description:
Marco (Hindi) Box Office Collection

Publication Date: December 20, 2024

Source: Sacnilk

The Malayalam action thriller Marco, directed by Haneef Adeni, features Unni Mukundan and has exhibited strong box office performance over its initial days in theaters.

  • Marco earned an estimated ₹ 1.93 crore in its first 10 days at the box office.
  • The film had a total collection of ₹ 0.28 crore in its first week.
  • Day-wise collections include ₹ 0.01 crore on Day 1 and ₹ 0.80 crore on Day 10.
  • Marco narrates the story of vengeance and justice, showcasing intense emotional and physical trials faced by the protagonist.
“Marco tells the story of its titular protagonist as he returns home to seek vengeance for the brutal murder of his adopted brother.”

In conclusion, Marco has successfully captured audience interest and is showing promising growth at the box office during its first 10 days of release.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: DOUBLE celebration for Hrithik Roshan - superstars birthday and Kaho Naa Pyaar Hais re-release to coincide on January 10, 2025 - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Hrithik Roshan Celebrates Birthday with Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai Re-release on January 10, 2025

Publication Date: December 27, 2024 | Source: Bollywood Hungama

Hrithik Roshan is set to celebrate his 25-year career anniversary in cinema with a re-release of his debut film, Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai, on January 10, 2025, coinciding with his birthday.

  • Hrithik Roshan debuted in Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai, which was released on January 14, 2000.
  • The film will be re-released in cinemas on January 10, 2025, with remastered prints.
  • This re-release happens in the same week as the original release date of Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai.
  • The re-release aims to attract younger audiences who have missed the film.
  • A documentary about the Roshan family will premiere on Netflix on January 17, 2025.
“Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai remains relevant due to its subject, super-hit music, and mass appeal.”

This re-release offers a nostalgic opportunity for fans and newcomers alike to enjoy the film in theaters.

item.title: She sang it better at 91: Karan Aujla on Asha Bhosle's 'Tauba Tauba' performance - India Today
item.description:
Singer Asha Bhosle, 91, Viral 'Tauba Tauba' Performance in Dubai

Date: Dec 30, 2024
Source: India Today

At her Dubai concert, veteran singer Asha Bhosle, 91, captivated the audience by singing Karan Aujla's chartbuster "Tauba Tauba" and even recreating the hook step originally performed by actor Vicky Kaushal. A video of her performance has gone viral on social media.

Draped elegantly in a white saree, Bhosle delivered a remarkable rendition of "Tauba Tauba" from the film Bad Newz. She set aside her microphone and performed the hook step, drawing loud cheers from the crowd.

The video sparked admiration and love from colleagues in the music and film industries. Karan Aujla, the original singer of "Tauba Tauba," expressed his gratitude with a heartfelt note and shared the video, stating, "She sang it at 91 better than me."

Watch the video here: https://www.indiatoday.in/videos

  1. Asha Bhosle's performance earned praise from numerous industry colleagues.
  2. The viral video highlights the singer's agility and adaptability at 91.
  3. The event brought together different generations and cultures through music.

Notable Quote: "She sang it at 91 better than me." - Karan Aujla

Conclusion: Asha Bhosle's 'Tauba Tauba' performance at 91 serves as an inspiration, proving that age is just a number when it comes to passion and talent.

item.title: Shahid Kapoor's team denies actor collaborating with Sujoy Ghosh for thriller - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Shahid Kapoor's Team Denies Actor's Collaboration with Sujoy Ghosh for Thriller

Date: Dec 30, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Sujoy Ghosh, who was reportedly stepping down from directing Shah Rukh Khan's next film King, is now said to be developing a thriller with actor Shahid Kapoor. However, Shahid's team has denied any such collaboration.

  • Sujoy Ghosh reportedly leaves King project
  • Shahid Kapoor's team denies collaboration on thriller
  • Sujoy Ghosh's past thriller projects
  • Shahid Kapoor's past thriller projects

Shah Rukh Khan's film King, previously helmed by Sujoy Ghosh, will now be directed by Siddharth Anand.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 25: Allu Arjun film flexes big in India; beats combined collections of Baby John, Marco, Max - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 25: Allu Arjun film flexes big in India; beats combined collections of Baby John, Marco, Max

Publication Date: 2024-12-25 | Source: The Indian Express

The blockbuster success of Pushpa 2: The Rule is evident from its impressive box office performance, outperforming several films released during the Christmas period.

  • In its fourth week, Pushpa 2 grossed Rs 37.25 crore in India.
  • It surpassed the combined earnings of Baby John, Marco, and Max which were released recently.
  • The film has become the highest grosser in Indian cinema for 2024.
  • Pushing the gross to Rs 1719.5 crore globally, it is expected to breach the Rs 1800 crore mark soon.
  • The film's dubbed version has also seen unprecedented success in the Hindi market.
“If this doesn’t showcase the strength and pull of this Allu Arjun-starrer, then what will?”

With no major releases imminent, Pushpa 2 is likely to maintain its strong position in theaters for the foreseeable future.

item.title: Rajesh Khanna wanted to marry THIS gorgeous actress before Dimple Kapadia, but rumours of her affair with cri - India.com
item.description:
Rajesh Khanna's Unmarried Life: A Look into His Relationship with Anju Mahendru

Date & Source: December 30, 2024, India.com

Rajesh Khanna, the iconic Bollywood actor, had a relationship with Anju Mahendru before marrying Dimple Kapadia. The couple lived together for seven years, but their relationship ended due to compatibility issues and rumors of Mahendru's affair with cricketer Gary Sobers.

  1. Rajesh Khanna wanted to marry Anju Mahendru but parted ways due to compatibility issues.
  2. Rumors of Anju Mahendru's affair with West Indies cricketer Gary Sobers caused a rift between the couple.
  3. Rajesh Khanna later married Dimple Kapadia, and they have two daughters, Twinkle and Rinke Khanna.
Anju Mahendru opened up about their relationship, saying, “I was critical because that’s how I am... He has always been sensitive to criticism, and I’ve always been very frank.”

Read the full story to learn more about Rajesh Khanna's relationship with Anju Mahendru and his life before marrying Dimple Kapadia.
